New Records: Shaheen Shah Afridi became the fastest to 100 ODI wickets for quick bowlers
Key Match Events: Mehidy Hasan Miraz took 3 wickets for 60 runs
Shakib Al Hasan scored 43 off 46 balls
Pakistan won by 7 wickets with 105 balls remaining
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan's win kept their faint hopes of a semi-final appearance alive
Bangladesh were officially out of the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: Fakhar Zaman said he knew he could hit sixes anywhere
Abdullah Shafique played a smear over cow corner off Taskin that flew all the way
Others: The match was played on October 31, 2023, at the Eden Gardens in Kolkata, India
Pakistan's win was their most convincing performance of the World Cup so far
